showcase_Data.project_description: Mishki Yaku is a coffee e-shop that offers the best Ecuadorian coffee. Their name comes from indigenous language Kichwa, meaning "delicious water", and refers to the sugary nectar that the hummingbirds sip from small calyxes with their long, thin beaks.

An innovative real state firm with the idea to bring a first-class experience to people who are searching for a house. People can sell and promote their properties through the website. I perform branch identity with colors and an overall design to represent the client's expectations.

mini_projects.description: A markdown parse made with React. Perfect to re-style text faster. Could be use for blog where the main content is text. An easier way to format your publications
A drum machine component with two sets of music sounds. You can hit the pads with mouse or keyboard binding keys. Functionality can be expanded to play more sounds.
A simple implementation of a calculator made with React. Can perform arithmetical operations.
An alarm clock app that lets you program work and breaks time sessions. You can see this app being implemented in some time management apps.

A web-app written with plain vanilla javascript that can tell you the weather using the location API of the browser. It performs an asynchronous operation to fetch the data. It uses a free weather API.

web_Proj_Large.description: Fullstack project created using React Redux (Front-End), Express, Node Js and Firebase as (Backend)
